sn55.41:2.1: 5. Sagāthakapuññābhisandavagga
sn55.41:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.41:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dhamme … pe …
sn55.41:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.41:6.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā, kusalābhisandā, sukhassāhārā.
sn55.41:7.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi puññābhisandehi kusalābhisandehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa na sukaraṃ puññassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ:
sn55.41:7.3: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
sn55.41:8.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde na sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ:
sn55.41:8.2: ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānī’ti vāti.
sn55.41:8.3: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
sn55.41:8.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, imehi catūhi puññābhisandehi kusalābhisandehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa na sukaraṃ puññassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇetuṃ:
sn55.41:8.6: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn55.41:9.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
sn55.41:11.2: Seyyāni paccattharaṇassa dāyakaṃ;
